sentence.Network_en: "Please don't yell at me." She began to sniffle.
sentence.Network_cn: “请不要对我大喊大叫。”她啜泣起来。

sentence.Network_en: She tried to sniff contemptuously, but succeeded in producing only a sniffle.
sentence.Network_cn: 她想用鼻子轻蔑地哼上一声,可是不成, 只发出一声鼻音.

sentence.Network_en: Linda cry all day and sniffle audibly around the corner.
sentence.Network_cn: 琳达在拐角处哭了一天并轻声地吸鼻涕.

2007年11月24日 - we.i.nan的日志 - 网易博客 ... ) rackety 摇晃的 ) sniffle 抽鼻子, 抽鼻涕 ) boar 公猪, 野猪.
... a single unit's worth of beer: 一个单位的啤酒，一单位酒精相当于半品脱啤酒。 sniffles: 鼻塞；感冒 humulone: 蛇麻烯.

list.abs: 鼻涕用英语怎么说？越多越好_百度知道 ... 鼻涕 snot To sniffle. 吸鼻子 To complain or whine tearfully. 抽噎：流着泪抱怨或哭诉.
鼻子 - English translation - bab.la... ... 鹰钩鼻子的 hawk-nosed 鼻子哼哼的做声 to sniffle 红鼻子的 coppernosed.
无脂（乳）固形物 SNF; solids-not-fat鼻涕症 sniffling disease打鼾；鼾声 snore
linda cry all day and sniffle audibly around the corner ., 琳达在拐角处哭了一天并轻声地吸鼻涕.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: imitative; compare with snivel

entry.def: If you sniffle, you keep sniffing, usually because you are crying or have a cold.

example.ex: 'Please don't yell at me.' She began to sniffle.
example.tran: “请不要对我大喊大叫。”她啜泣起来。

entry.def: A sniffle is a slight cold. You can also say that someone has the sniffles .

means.word_mean: 1. the act of breathing heavily through the nose (as when the nose is congested)

sentences.sentence: "Stop snivelling--you got yourself into this mess!"
"the sick student was sniffling in the back row"

auth_sentence.content: On the bank, stock still, I have had water voles sniffle-snuffling on busy errands, under my rod-top.
auth_sentence.res_content: On the bank, stock still, I have had water voles sniffle-snuffling on busy errands, under my rod-top.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On the bank, stock still, I have had water voles sniffle-snuffling on busy errands, under my rod-top.

auth_sentence.content: Take an antihistamine at the first sign of a sniffle if you're prone to allergies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Take an antihistamine at the first sign of a sniffle if you're prone to allergies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Take an antihistamine at the first sign of a sniffle if you're prone to allergies.

sentences.en: I wish you wouldn’t keep sniffling.
sentences.cn: 但愿你别总抽鼻子就好了。

sentences.en: I have been sniffling for weeks.
sentences.cn: 我伤风鼻塞了好几个星期。

sentences.en: The child stopped crying, but kept on sniffling.
sentences.cn: 那个小孩子不哭了, 但仍在抽噎。

sentences.en: There were a few sniffles in the audience at the end of the play.
sentences.cn: 在戏剧结尾时, 有些观众抽噎起来。
